ProjectTitle: Inter-organelle communication through membrane contact sites in oncology and neurodegenerative diseases (InterAction)

4.2. Metadata standards
Have a look at tips for suitable metadata standards for life sciences research: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata/life_sciences
7.3 Data  sharing - where
Can you name the data repositories you plan to use?  Suggestions:
- imaging data: https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/bioimaging_data#data-publication-and-archiving
- biomolecular data: https://elixir-europe.org/platforms/data/elixir-deposition-databases
- plasmids: https://www.addgene.org/
- else KU Leuven RDR (research data repository): https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
